title: The Secret to Making Claude 10x Better than ChatGPT (MCP Tutorial)

rawLines.text: Chat GBT and Claude are basically the
same tool except for this one feature
called MCP. When you properly set up
this feature right here, Claude becomes
10 times better than chat GPT. Once you
set this up, Claude becomes a full AI
agent equipped with all of the tools
that it chooses to use. It chooses when
to use each of these tools. And in this
video, I'm going to show you exactly how
to set this up. some example workflows
that I use to do research, create
content, generate thumbnails, all from
the comfort of my chatbot LLM. And this
is something that ChatGBT just doesn't
have access to right now. Let's not
waste any time. Let's begin setting it
up. So, if you haven't already, you need
to get Claude and not the web version of
Claude. What you need is the desktop
version of Claude. So on your browser,
just type in desktop download and this
will take you to this page right here
and then download it for whatever
computer you have. I have a Mac. Once
you have Claude downloaded, your screen
will look a lot like this. And if you
hover over tools and you click on it,
you won't see anything down here. So
Claude Sonnet 4 is an agent. Claude Opus
4 is an even more powerful agent. They
are agents out of the box. As soon as
you download Claude, they are an agent.
And an agent is just an AI that can use
tools in a loop. So it isn't an
automation, meaning if one thing
happens, then this thing happens. When
you chat with it, it will decide what
tools to use. And these are all of the
tools that it can use. When you're just
now starting out on Claude, you won't

I deleted all of the tools that I
normally have access to and we're going
to be adding them. And you can
theoretically have 200 to 300 different
tools that your Claude agent can access
every time you ask it a question or tell
